pre-shared-key.description: Pre-shared key for secure tunnel between HA controllers (Length: 8-32)

heartbeat-threshold.description: Inter-controller heartbeat threshold. Range 3 to 10. Default 5.

heartbeat-interval.description: Inter-controller heartbeat interval. Range 100 to 1000ms. Default 100ms.

ip.description: Controller IPv4 Address (Should be the controller-ip)

ipv6.description: Controller IPv6 Address (Should be the controller-ip)

source.description: Name of HA group information to copy

partition_id.description: Image to be copied onto partition 0 or 1

ap_preload_batch_size.description: Number of APs doing simultaneous image preload

imagepath.description: Image path on the fileserver, use '.' to specify default path

new_standby_aac.description: IP Address of New Standby AAC

new_standby_aac_v6.description: IPv6 Address of New Standby AAC

text.description: Text description (up to 80 characters in quote)

duration.description: Elapsed time in minutes before tracking takes effect (0-1440)

vrid.description: Virtual Router ID in which to track its MASTER state

vlanId.description: vlan id used for tracking changes

secs.description: Time in seconds (30-120). Default value is 45.

new_standby_aac.description: IP Address of New Standby AAC

new_standby_aac_v6.description: IPv6 Address of New Standby AAC

key.description: IPSEC key of length up to 64 bytes

ca.description: CA Certificate Name in Trusted Certificate Store

sc.description: Server Certificate Name in Server Certificate Store

key.description: IPSEC key of length up to 64 bytes

ca.description: CA Certificate Name in Trusted Certificate Store

sc.description: Server Certificate Name in Server Certificate Store

sync-time.description: Time between file syncs. The value must be in the range [30-180] minutes, Default: 30

text.description: Text description (up to 80 characters in quote)

password.description: Password of length up to 8 characters

duration.description: Elapsed time in minutes before tracking takes effect (0-1440)

vrid.description: Virtual Router ID in which to track its MASTER state

vlanId.description: vlan id used for tracking changes

secs.description: Time in seconds (30-120). Default value is 45.

partition_id.description: Image to be copied onto partition 0 or 1

ap_preload_batch_size.description: Number of APs doing simultaneous image preload

imagepath.description: Image path on the fileserver, use '.' to specify default path

group-membership.description: HA group to which this controller belongs

new_standby_aac.description: IP Address of New Standby AAC

new_standby_aac_v6.description: IPv6 Address of New Standby AAC

lifetime.description: Lifetime in hours for Cached access credential. Valid range is 1-168 hours. Default is 24 hours

rap_public_ip.description: IP Address of RAP for cluster behind NAT

ip.description: Controller IPv4 Address (Should be the controller-ip)

ipv6.description: Controller IPv6 Address (Should be the controller-ip)

active-client-rebalance-threshold.description: Redistribute active client load when active load on any cluster node is beyond this configured percentage. Default active client rebalance threshold is 20.

standby-client-rebalance-threshold.description: Redistribute standby client load when total load on any cluster node is beyond this configured percentage. Default standby client rebalance threshold is 40.

unbalance-threshold.description: The minimum difference in load percentage between max loaded cluster node and min loaded cluster node to let load balancing algorithm kick in

heartbeat-threshold.description: Cluster will wait for heartbeat threshold time (ms) before declaring a peer cluster node as dead.

active-ap-rebalance-threshold-percentage.description: Active AP rebalancing will kick in once this rebalance threshold is hit on any controller. Default Active AP rebalance threshold is 20.

active-ap-unbalance-threshold-percentage.description: Active AP rebalancing will kick in once rebalance threshold is hit on any controller and the difference between the max and min loaded controller is more than this unbalance threshold percentage.

active-ap-rebalance-ap-count.description: The number of APs considered to be rebalanced if Active AP rebalance kicks in. Default AP rebalance count is 50.

active-ap-rebalance-timer.description: Timer ,in minutes, to kick-in the active ap rebalancing operation.

source.description: Name of Classic Controller Cluster Profile to copy

active_uac_idx.description: Index of UAC in Bucket-Map's UAC List

standby_uac_idx.description: Index of UAC in Bucket-Map's UAC List or -1 if no standby desired

partition_id.description: Image to be copied onto partition 0 or 1

ap_preload_batch_size.description: Number of APs doing simultaneous image preload

imagepath.description: Image path on the fileserver, use '.' to specify default path

new_standby_aac.description: IP Address of New Standby AAC

new_standby_aac_v6.description: IPv6 Address of New Standby AAC

partition_id.description: Image to be copied onto partition 0 or 1

ap_preload_batch_size.description: Number of APs doing simultaneous image preload

month.description: Month of scheduling. Accepted range of values 1-12.

day.description: Day of scheduling. Accepted range of values 1-31

hh.description: Hour of scheduling in 24 hour format. Accepted range of values 0-23

mm.description: Minute of scheduling. Accepted range of values 0-59

ss.description: Second of scheduling. Accepted range of values 0-59

partition_id.description: Image to be copied onto partition 0 or 1

ap_preload_batch_size.description: Number of APs doing simultaneous image preload

excludevlan.description: List of exception VLANs seperated by comma(,), range by (-). Max string length: 256
